features.featureTitle: In `frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts`, locate the Day 3 itinerary item that contains the recommendation card for shop name "संस्कृति नॉवेल्टी (पुरुषोत्तम भाई मच्छर)" and completely delete the `image:` property from that specific recommendation-card object (do not set it to null and do not replace it with any placeholder URL).
